| A living lectern:* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* has a [thick hide](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless").
* resists death magic.
* does not naturally [regenerate](/wiki/Regenerate "Regenerate") HP. |                                                                                                       |

A **living lectern**, ', is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"). The living lectern is a type of [golem](/wiki/Golem "Golem") composed of an animated [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") on a stand made of [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood"): it is [thick-skinned](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned"), [amphibious](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious") and incapable of [regenerating](/wiki/Regenerating "Regenerating") [HP](/wiki/HP "HP") in addition to other standard golem traits.

A living lectern has two claw attacks and a [magic missile](/index.php?title=Magic_missile_\(monster_spell\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Magic missile (monster spell) (page does not exist)") attack, and possesses [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance"), [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") and [death resistance](/wiki/Death_resistance "Death resistance") like all golems.

## Generation

Living lecterns are not randomly generated, and normally-created living lecterns are always hostile. Living lecterns always generate with 50 HP.

A living lectern is guaranteed to appear in the ruined library of [the Lost Cities](/index.php?title=The_Lost_Cities\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "The Lost Cities (page does not exist)") within the [Neutrality Quest](/wiki/Neutral_Quest_\(dNetHack\) "Neutral Quest (dNetHack)"), with a 1⁄4 chance of a second one being generated. [Waterlogged libraries](/wiki/Special_room_\(dNetHack\) "Special room (dNetHack)") generate one to four living lecterns at level creation.

Living lecterns drop 2-6 [clubs](/wiki/Club "Club") and a random spellbook upon death [in place of a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless").

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Living_lectern\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Living lectern

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
' living lectern (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks Claw 3d4 physical, Claw 3d4 physical, Magic 0d4 magic missiles
' living lectern (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Claw 3d4 physical, Claw 3d4 physical, Magic 0d4 magic missiles

Base level 7
Base experience 142
Speed 6
Base AC 2
Base MR 50
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1500
Nutritional value 0
Size medium
Resistances sleep, poison

A living lectern:

  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • is mindless.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • has a thick hide.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • resists death magic.
  • does not naturally regenerate HP.

A living lectern, ', is a type of monster that appears in dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack. The living lectern is a type of golem composed of an animated spellbook on a stand made of wood: it is thick-skinned, amphibious and incapable of regenerating HP in addition to other standard golem traits.

A living lectern has two claw attacks and a magic missile attack, and possesses sleep resistance, poison resistance and death resistance like all golems.

Generation

Living lecterns are not randomly generated, and normally-created living lecterns are always hostile. Living lecterns always generate with 50 HP.

A living lectern is guaranteed to appear in the ruined library of the Lost Cities within the Neutrality Quest, with a 1⁄4 chance of a second one being generated. Waterlogged libraries generate one to four living lecterns at level creation.

Living lecterns drop 2-6 clubs and a random spellbook upon death in place of a corpse.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Living_lectern&oldid=177363"

A '''living lectern''', {{brown|'}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[dNetHack]], [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]]. The living lectern is a type of [[golem]] composed of an animated [[spellbook]] on a stand made of [[wood]]: it is [[thick-skinned]], [[amphibious]] and incapable of [[regenerating]] [[HP]] in addition to other standard golem traits.

A living lectern has two claw attacks and a [[Magic missile (monster spell)|magic missile]] attack, and possesses [[sleep resistance]], [[poison resistance]] and [[death resistance]] like all golems.

==Generation==
Living lecterns are not randomly generated, and normally-created living lecterns are always hostile. Living lecterns always generate with 50 HP.

A living lectern is guaranteed to appear in the ruined library of [[the Lost Cities]] within the [[Neutral Quest (dNetHack)|Neutrality Quest]], with a {{frac|4}} chance of a second one being generated. [[Special room (dNetHack)|Waterlogged libraries]] generate one to four living lecterns at level creation.

Living lecterns drop 2-6 [[club]]s and a random spellbook upon death [[Corpseless|in place of a corpse]].
